title: ODESZA Are Coming Home for Special Foreign Family 10-Year Anniversary Show in Seattle
description: After closing the curtain on their massive "The Last Goodbye" tour, ODESZA are returning to where it all began for an intimate anniversary celebration.
author: Cameron Sunkel
excerpt: After closing the curtain on their massive "The Last Goodbye" tour, ODESZA are returning to where it all began for an intimate anniversary celebration.

html:
After closing the curtain on their massive "The Last Goodbye" tour, ODESZA are returning to where it all began for an intimate anniversary celebration.

After closing the curtain on their massive "The Last Goodbye" tour, ODESZA are returning to where it all began for an intimate anniversary celebration.

  • Home
  • EVENTS

A decade ago, two college friends from Western Washington launched a record label that helped shape an era of electronic music. This summer, that passion comes full circle as ODESZA return to Seattle for a once-in-a-decade homecoming.

The duo announced a special performance in their hometown of Seattle to commemorate the 10-year anniversary of Foreign Family Collective, the independent label and artist community they founded back in 2015. A decade after laying the first brick, they are building a stage to celebrate everything the brand has become, a haven for unconventional voices and a catalyst for an era of emotive electronic music.

"We were two kids starting Foreign Family for the love of music, community, and sharing incredible art," ODESZA wrote on Instagram. What a ride it’s been since March 2015… See you in Seattle on August 2nd. The lineup? That's a secret, for now."

That secret lineup only heightens the stakes considering Foreign Family has long served as a launchpad for genre-defying artists. From the label’s earliest days, ODESZA used their platform to elevate other emerging artists, many of whom would go on to contribute electronic sleeper hits like Jai Wolf's "Indian Summer" and Big Wild's "When I Get There."

Scroll to Continue

To ensure tickets go directly to fans, ODESZA are using Fair AXS registration. Fans must register by Sunday, March 23rd at 10pm PT for a chance to purchase tickets.
